docs.lead_paragraph: In this era of mommy confessionals, I must admit: I am not a pet person. With their allergic father, I have reared three children without benefit of in-house canines, felines or invited rodents. But with researchers beginning to focus on children and pets, I find myself interested, though occasionally cynical or defensive.

headline.main: 18 And Under: Can Fido and Whiskers Enrich Children's Lives?

docs.abstract: Scientists are bringing rigor to the study of the emotional and psychological effects of pet ownership on children; early evidence suggests that some individual children do experience emotional benefits from relationships with animals, but the details remain elusive. Drawing (M)

docs.lead_paragraph: Meet the woman who has become the face of Chile’s student protests.

headline.main: Camila Vallejo, the World’s Most Glamorous Revolutionary
headline.print_headline: ‘They Made Her an Icon, Which Is Impossible To Live Up To’

docs.abstract: Francisco Goldman article profiles Camila Vallejo, 23-year-old former president of the University of Chile student federation who has become the face of Chile's student protests.
